    P

    pay(int, int) - Method in class items.OrganParts
    Deducts the specified cost from the inventory if affordable.
    payCost(int, int) - Method in class entity.Player
    Checks if player can afford the cost and deducts it if possible.
    playBGM(String, double) - Static method in class utils.SoundManager
    Plays background music in a loop.
    playEnemyAttack(Runnable) - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Plays the enemy's attack animation.
    playEnemyDefend(boolean, boolean) - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Plays the enemy's defense animation.
    Player - Class in entity
    Represents the main player character controlled by the user.
    Player(String) - Constructor for class entity.Player
    Initialize the player with default stats and name.
    playPlayerAttack(Runnable) - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Plays the player's attack animation.
    playPlayerDefend(boolean, boolean) - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Plays the player's defense animation.
    playSound(String) - Static method in class utils.SoundManager
    Plays a short sound effect.
    poisonDamagePerTurn - Variable in class entity.Character
    Damage taken per turn from poison.
    poisonTurns - Variable in class entity.Character
    Remaining turns for poison effect.
    Potion - Class in items
    Represents a potion item used to restore health.
    Potion(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class items.Potion
    Constructs a new Potion.
    potions() - Method in record class shop.Shop
    Returns an unmodifiable list of available potions.
    Purchasable - Interface in interfaces
    Interface for items that can be purchased in the shop.
